email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are pleased to provide a freight quote for the shipment of 75,000 MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Our initial freight quote is USD 25 per metric ton.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, which has a DWT of 82,000 and LOA of 225m. Please let us know your thoughts and if you have any specific requirements for the laycan or loading window.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the quote. The rate seems reasonable, but we are looking to secure a better rate given the current market conditions. Could you review the rate and possibly offer a discount?

Also, could you provide the demurrage rate per day and the laytime start and end dates?

Thanks,
Michael Lee
Charterer Co.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your interest. Considering the current market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 23 per metric ton. The demurrage rate will be USD 12,000 per day.

The laytime will start on 2024-04-01 and end on 2024-04-15. We can offer a laytime of 7 days with the demurrage rate of USD 12,000 per day thereafter.

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the revised quote. The rate of USD 23 per metric ton is more in line with our expectations. However, we need to ensure that the demurrage rate is reasonable. Could you confirm the laytime start and end dates?

Best,
Michael Lee
Charterer Co.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

The laytime will start on 2024-04-01 and end on 2024-04-15. We can offer a laytime of 7 days with the demurrage rate of USD 12,000 per day thereafter.

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

We are satisfied with the terms and the laytime period. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Thanks,
Michael Lee
Charterer Co.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Brokers
